scripts.meta: node current/meta-to-js.js src/meta.meta build/meta-parser.js && node src/tmeta-to-js.js src/meta-to-js.tmeta build/meta-parser.js build/meta-to-js.js
scripts.update-parsers: npm run tmeta && cp build/tmeta-parser.js current/ && npm run tmeta && cp build/tmeta-parser.js current/ && npm run tmeta && npm run meta && cp build/meta-parser.js current/ && npm run meta && cp build/meta-parser.js current/ && npm run meta
